file_content.text: Once my clearance goes through, I'll be leaving. I'll tell everyone what you did--thank you again.
Your colleagues are safe. They're on their way back.
They survived? Thank you, Master Jedi, thank you!
Thank you, so much--I see why they call you the Republic's finest.
They're alive? I--I can't believe it. Thank you.
Thank you. All of you. I--I don't know what else to say.
Once I've seen the others, I should... leave Belsavis. Tell someone what I did here.
Take this. I made it to keep myself safe. At least one of my designs should do some good in the galaxy.
Did you find my colleagues yet? They might not have much time!
Belsavis is a place of retribution and justice, isn't it? Finding ways to make things right....
Did you see those horrific experiments in the main wing? Forcing sentient beings to fight one another? I designed those experiments. Me!
I was told they were in the name of science. I believed the lie. And now my colleagues are the ones suffering for my foolishness.
Maybe you were deceived, but you must have known this was wrong.
You're still responsible.
Nothing is achieved without sacrifice. I kept telling myself that.
Our actions are dependent on the truths we're given.
Lies give rise to mistakes.
If your team is in trouble, come up with a plan.
Then make it right.
All I can think is that it should have been me!
Whenever something's done "in the name of science," it always means trouble.
Never trust scientists.
What did you do, exactly?
You're hysterical.
A Senator ordered it. Run combat tests among the prisoners, gather data.... Turned out to be a sadistic whim of his.
Those who survived the "Noble Focus" experiments--that I devised!--were never the same. A group of Gand was driven utterly insane.
The Gand broke out yesterday, hunting the one responsible. I--I would have accepted their punishment, but they took my colleagues instead! Please--someone has to help them!
I will.
There's hundreds of soldiers here, couldn't they mount a rescue?
What about Republic support?
With the prison break and the Empire to handle? They can't. I tried.
The security footage shows those Gand dragging my friends to one of those old vaults. Down to the lower levels, I think.
Please, save them. Stop the Gand. Don't let anyone else suffer because of my stupidity.
Not me. [Refuse quest]
How many more have to die because of my stupidity?
It's all my fault. Why do I never think?
